main.name: Devin Osborne
main.description: Developer by Day, Founder & Entrepreneur by Night. #builtdifferent
main.bio: I am an entrepreneur at heart, with an incredible passion for innovation, an everlasting desire for knowledge, and a hope to impact the world. Born in the small town of Quincy, Illinois, I moved to Birmingham, Alabama to attend Samford University. While studying marketing and business, I spent an overwhelming amount of time focused on technology and software engineering. I love to build things, and I love to help others. I often work past the point of exhaustion, but I never tire. I have a longing passion to be a public speaker alongside my business innovations and technology habits. My mission: to create something that causes as much impact as the iPhone.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Upon a passion to learn, my academic achievement allowed me to join Samford University's honors college to study business and music. After a freshman year, I realized I had little time to invest in music if I wished to fully dive into business software engineering. In my free time, I invested nearly every hour of the day to working on projects and businesses. It was during these times when I discovered the power of thinking differently.

work.title: Software Developer & Creative, Intern
work.description: At University Fancards, we are changing the way people pay. I was brought on as a volunteer intern looking to exchange my time for education and rapid learning. Over my time at University Fancards, I learned everything from mass-market advertising to implementing native APIs. The primary projects I worked on was building a data dashboard app, implementing a store locator witholding nearly 10,000 locations, and working on our products primary website. Leveraged Learning: React JS, Node JS, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, Python, AWS, APIs.

work.title: Marketing & Technology Director
work.description: Creating fantastic food flavors and experiences.

projects.title: Fatbacks BBQ Website && Ordering Platform
projects.category: BBQ restaurant website with a focus on online ordering

projects.title: Los Molcajetes Mexican Restaurant Website
projects.category: Mexican restaurant website used to bring in traffic to the store

testimonials.text: Devin is one of the hardest workers I know. Nothing stops him from achieving greatness. He's truly outstanding!
If you need somebody to do quality work, it's this guy. I have known Devin but a few years, but everything he has done for me has put me on top!
